languages.text:
Every time the wearer scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, they restore <u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
<indent=5%>+15% critical damage</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Every time the wielder scores a critical hit with a melee weapon, they restore <u>(Agility bonus / 2)</u> wounds and gain +2 movement points.
<indent=5%>+15% critial damage</indent>

Every time the wearer scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}critical hit{/g} with a melee weapon, they restore <u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
<indent=5%>+15% critical damage</indent>

Every time the wearer scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, they restore <u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
<indent=5%>+15% critical damage</indent>

Every time the wearer scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, they restore <u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
<indent=5%>+15% critical damage</indent>

languages.text:
每当装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}时，可恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于<u>（{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}/2）</u>，同时获得2点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}提高15%。</indent>
languages.original_text:
Every time the wearer scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, they restore <u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
<indent=5%>+15% critical {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}</indent>

traits.locale_text:
每当装备者使用近战武器造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}暴击{/g}时，可恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于<u>（{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}/2）</u>，同时获得2点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。
<indent=5%>暴击伤害提高15%</indent>。

languages.text:
Cada vez que el portador asesta un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g} con un arma {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, recupera <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} y gana +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}.
<indent=5%>+15 % de daño crítico</indent>
languages.original_text:
Every time the wearer scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, they restore <u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
<indent=5%>+15% critical damage</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Cada vez que el portador asesta un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}impacto crítico{/g} con un arma cuerpo a cuerpo, recupera <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} y gana +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}.
<indent=5%>+15 % de daño crítico</indent>

languages.text:
着用者が{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}武器で{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}を出す度に、{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}を<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}/2)</u>回復し、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が+2される。
<indent=5%>クリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}+15%</indent>
languages.original_text:
Every time the wearer scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, they restore <u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
<indent=5%>+15% critical {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}</indent>

traits.locale_text:
着用者が近接武器で{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}クリティカルヒット{/g}を出す度に、{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}を<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}/2)</u>回復し、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が+2される。
<indent=5%>クリティカルダメージ +15%</indent>

languages.text:
Совершая {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}рукопашным{/g} оружием, персонаж восстанавливает <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} и получает +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.
<indent=5%>+15% к критическому урону.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Every time the wearer scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, they restore <u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
<indent=5%>+15% critical damage</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Совершая {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критическое попадание{/g} рукопашным оружием, персонаж восстанавливает <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} и получает +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.
<indent=5%>+15% к критическому урону.</indent>

Совершая {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критическое попадание{/g} рукопашным оружием, персонаж восстанавливает <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} и получает +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.
<indent=5%>+15% к критическому урону.</indent>

languages.text:
Erzielt der Träger einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} mit einer {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfwaffe{/g}, heilt er <u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} und erhält +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}.
<indent=5%>+15 % kritischer Schaden</indent>
languages.original_text:
Every time the wearer scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, they restore <u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
<indent=5%>+15% critical damage</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Immer wenn der Träger einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}kritischen Treffer{/g} mit einer Nahkampfwaffe landet, heilt er <u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} und erhält +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
<indent=5%>+15% kritischer Schaden</indent>

languages.text:
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}inflige un coup critique{/g} avec une arme de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g}, il reconstitue <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} dans sa réserve et bénéficie de +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}.
<indent=5%>+15 % de dégâts critiques</indent>
languages.original_text:
Every time the wearer scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, they restore <u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
<indent=5%>+15% critical damage</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}inflige un coup critique{/g} à l'aide d'une arme de mêlée, il reconstitue <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} dans sa réserve et bénéficie de +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}.
<indent=5%>+15 % de dégâts critiques</indent>
